tidyList.title: Check if an array is empty
Compare two arrays regardless of order
tidyList.codebox:
x = [2,4,5,7,1]
y = [1,2,4,5,7]
if set(x) == set(y):
    print("true")
#output: true

tidyList.title: Compare two arrays
tidyList.codebox:
x = [2,4,5,7,1]
y = [1,2,4,5,7]
if x == y:
    print("true")
#output: true

tidyList.title: Swap the rows and columns of a matrix (Transpose two-dimensional array)
tidyList.codebox:
import numpy as np
a_2d = np.arange(6).reshape(2, 3)
print(a_2d)
a_2d_T = a_2d.T
print(a_2d_T)
